lokal.noOtherOffices: No other offices found from this seller.

boxes.title: Your place in Halmstad's work life
boxes.subtitle: Discover, rent or lease office spaces – simple, local and flexible.
boxes.text1: Do you have a vacant space? Connect with companies and professionals in Halmstad looking for their next workplace. It's easy, fast and reaches the right audience.
boxes.text2: Find offices that suit your needs. Need a place for a day, a month or long-term? Our marketplace offers flexible solutions for your business.
boxes.text3: We are Halmstad's dedicated platform for office rentals. Enjoy transparent pricing, local ads and a community-driven approach to finding and sharing workplaces.

inbox.headerText: Manage your messages and requests from interested buyers.
inbox.noneSub: New messages will appear here as they arrive.
inbox.select: Select a message from the list to view details

saved.errorText: Could not fetch your saved offices. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
saved.noneText: When you find an office you like, you can save it here to easily find it later.
saved.title: Your saved offices
saved.headerText: Here you will find all office spaces you have saved to view later.

listtoday.title: Advertise your office
listtoday.description1: Get started right away and reach potential tenants in just a few minutes.
listtoday.description2: Create an account today to easily list your office and make it visible to companies looking for office space in Halmstad.

previouslookedat.popularSubtitle: The most sought-after offices right now
previouslookedat.recentSubtitle: Continue exploring offices you've been interested in

textsection.title: Find and list office spaces locally in Halmstad
textsection.description: Halmstad Lokaler is the platform for finding and renting office spaces in and around Halmstad. Here you'll find everything from coworking environments to private offices and fully equipped spaces – close to the city center, the coast, and good transport connections.
